content.detailedDescription:
Me and my colleague were on a night shift.
we knew that this particular night we could observe the perseid meteor shower, so we went outside on the balcony around 4:10 am.
while looking at the night sky and trying to see a meteorite, i noticed a white-yellow dot , which looked like a meteorite and was moving.
however, the object appeared to sped up, then slow down, then sped up again, every time like it was trying to catch up - this happened several times. it was also changing directions.
this lasted for about 10 seconds after i noticed it.
then, the object kinda split into 2 parts, the smaller one ejected to the opposite side of the direction the bigger was going and after 1 second stopped. the bigger object sped up immensely, away from the smaller and after 5-6 seconds its light started to fade away and it was not visible anymore.
the smaller however stayed at the spot it had stopped. after i looked away, however, i was not able to be 100% sure it was still there, as it looked exactly like any other star it the sky.
my colleague saw the whole thing with me, i asked him several times "are you seeing this?!", he just said "yea, yea..."
content.summary: Meteorite-like object, observed during perseid meteor shower, changed directions, speed and ejected a second object

o objeto deloca e pousa varias vezes
content.summary: Altã­ssima velocidade somente em camera slow para ver

content.detailedDescription: This took place on the big rideau lake in ontario, south side of horseshoe bay in late summer 1974. my friend and i were on the dock thinking of going swimming (it was about 10 p.M. or so).  i looked out at the main lake to my right and saw the roughly edged large cigar shaped object in the sky.  it was orange. i didn't think too much at first, but then asked my friend what she thought it was.  she seemed alarmed, we kept watching until above the cigar shaped object a large red-orange sphere or circle suddenly appeared. neither objects made any sound or moved after that.  we were very frightened and went back inside the cottage where we were spending the night alone.  we tried to rationalize the objects and felt someone else must have seen and would be able to tell us what it was.  no one we talked to seemed to have seen anything.  we were teenagers at the time so our story was dismissed as weather, or a plane, fireworks etc.  i spent many years at the cottage since and have never seen anythink like it.
content.summary: Cigar shaped with rough edges, orange-red, above it appeared a large orange-red orb or sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog outside of my apartment/house last night around 8:15 pm est

i always look up at the sky for constellations, and i noticed that a red/orange clearly defined diamond was hovering in the same location that i had noticed a similar object of the same characteristics and description on 11/17/15 at 9:30 pm.

i thought the object was a plane of helicopter at first, but it did not move like a place (it was hovering) and it did not make a sound at all, unlike a chopper.

the object hovered as a red/orange diamond for about 5 mins 15 degrees above the horizon, then changed shape as it started moving south and to a much higher altitude, where it became a pulsating white dot.  10 minutes later it disappeared.

i was not scared, but i was anxious that i would not be able to get my camera phone (android lg g3) out in time, which i did and was able to take some poor quality video.  i could not see the object in the viewfinder as i was filming, but it was captured.  8 seconds in on the attached video, and i am including a screen grab for a reference.  you will see lights of a house as well that are much more prominent.
content.summary: Red/orange diamond that changed shape to a blinking solid dot - same experience i reported on 11/17/15

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were driving to her place 9ish, it takes about 50 minutes to get there. we were driving up a slight grade with farmers fields all around us, so you can see for a long ways away all around us. we start going down the grade and there is a slight bend and you by a big long farmers field. as we were driving i was looking at the stars and all around because the night was super super clear, not a single cloud, fog, smoke or anything. we came around the corner and in front of us just a little bit over the tree lines and power poles a huge light appeared, it was a really big object, super bright blue and whitish light. it was going super fast and went a ways away for about 4 seconds or so than just disappeared in thin air, if something that big was in the air before i would have noticed it because the whole area was clear with fields, and i would have saw it going up the little grade. the object disappeared before it went out of the horizon. there was a super bright blue and white flames coming from the back of it with sparks coming off it too. it was shocking as it was so big, and was so close to the land going so fast and just appeared and disappeared. this is a very rural area so traffic around 9:50pmish to 10pm is very very rare and we did not see a car that night. after i pulled over looking out my windows to see for something else i could not see anything, but there was a white trail left from where the object was, it was not a smokey trail. it was just a somewhat bright white trail left from where it went. after a couple minutes to calm down because we were both left nervous and uneasy. we left and right after we left a few seconds down the road we drove through a super super thick fog, it took about 10 - 15 seconds to drive through, that was really weird too because that night was so clear without a cloud or anything. after we drive through the fog it just went back to super clear. a few days later on facebook people tagged me in a link, i clicked it and it was sightings of a fire ball from a satellite in halifax. halifax is in the opposite direction about a 1 hour and 40 minutes away if not more. the fireball sightings were also around 6ish pm and there was a video of it posted and it looked nothing like what me and my girlfriend saw plus we were in the opposite direction, looked nothing like it, and was hours after the fire all sightings. the object i saw was so big and so low too. i could see almost all the details to it because it was so low. everyone thought i was crazy, but i know what i saw. this has been bothering me ever since. i saw in pei a video of a ufo a guy had on facebook and said he contacted you guys so i thought i would too. if you need anymore information please let me know as i want to figure out if i saw a ufo or not. if you need more detail make sure to get back to me as well. thank you.
content.summary: Bright blue and white going very fast and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful spring evening, june 18, 2014, and i was sitting on my deck by the lakeside (lake huron), and suddenly a bright orange burst of light broke through the low hanging canopy of clouds. it shone scintillating pulses of yellowish golden light against the clouds. even though it was around ten p.M. there was plenty of light on the lake, so i could see very clearly what transpired over the next eight to ten minutes.The light emanated from its top and was bright orange. my first reaction was total disbelief at what i was seeing, for i knew immediately this was no conventional aircraft. the craft hung over my head about thirty feet out from where i sat, and about one hundred feet above over the lake. it was a dull, very dull black diamond shaped craft, and no noise was emitted. i suddenly felt very nervous as it slowly changed direction and floated slowly toward me all the while descending. it was the dullest non reflective black i had ever seen and its diamond shape appeared to morph ever so slightly as it approached me. its orange ball shaped light intensified as it came nearer. at this point i remember being frightened and yet somehow strangely intrigued. it was a large craft about the size of a city bus. i stood up from my chair and focused my attention on it, and felt overwhelmed by its strange appearance. i've seen many planes, helicopters, ultralight planes, over the lake, and this craft defied any correspondence with anything i had ever seen. as i walked toward it on my deck it suddenly stopped directly above me, and my body began to shiver uncontrollably, and suddenly, it accelerated across the lake toward the western horizon disappearing within seconds. it was a mind boggling experience to say the least, and what it was looked both beautiful and mesmerizing. to this day i can still visualize the craft as if it just happened.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It descended slowly through cloud canopy over lake huron as it did itorage light emitted a strange golden yellowish sheen against the clouds it was dull black diamond shaped and about the size of a bus it departed at an enormous speed

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside having a smoke and coffee, then i noticed 2 lights flying (looked like a plane at first) but the green light at the back, broke off and started flying around the yellow light in a irregular pattern. it was flying the same speed as a commercial plane or helicopter would fly, but with the one flying around it, it didn't seem like something a plane or helicopter could do.
content.summary: Green light followed yellow light, then broke off and irratically flying around

content.detailedDescription:
Never seen anything like this in my life it hoved and moved around and then took off   the ufo made no noise at all.  it knew i was looking at it and was looking back but no alien was seen just the craft.  during the event i felt like i was unable to move till it left the area 

robert huhnken
content.summary: Never seen anything like this in my life it hoved and moved around and then took off   the ufo made no noise at all.  it knew i was looking at it and was looking back but no alien was seen just the craft

content.detailedDescription: On june 6, 2015 at 9:25 pm ast a very bright stationary light was seen in the evening sky above fundy national park in new brunswick, canada.  it appeared before any stars populated the sky that evening.  fundy national park is a dark preserve so stars are very visible in this location. it remained in the sky until at least midnight and it was much brighter than any stars.  i have a cottage here and i have never seen this light before or since this occurrence. if you look at the photos you can actually seen two lights as one as you focus in.  another strange occurance was that as i was watching the light a low level military aircraft flew overhead.  it may have been an orion sub hunter but i have never seen one of those fly over this area of the bay of fundy before so it may have been just odd timing if that was the craft.
content.summary: Large stationary light before stars came out. if you focus the light is actually two lights together.Have not seen this light before or since. stayed several hours large military aircraft flew overhead later. may have been a sub hunter but very unusual.

content.detailedDescription:
Once upon a time, dawid harisiumiak (not legal by the way) saw a spoon and told me it was hovering. it then burnt and disintegrated.





the end. 
ps. he was on ket.
content.summary: I was thinking about world of warcraft and then suddenly, a spoon started to hover over my head.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
1. leaving dinner, going to friends house to watch the bachelor
2. i have had multiple foreign object experiences lately and each sighting starts the same. i notice a certain type of glowing light in the sky. this type of glow is brighter and more yellow than a regular star. it almost appears like 2 glowing light bulbs, one on top of the other. they shine in a way that i feel drawn to it. like hypnotized. it's like it seduces me. as its glowing in a sort of pulsating pattern, the object is still not moving. other similar objects i have seen have been known to fly towards the main pulsating object. the other objects are strange because the lights can be extremely bright projecting a yellow, blue, red light but they are also able to turn off the lights completely. the direction in which all the objects fly is unusual. i have documented in slow mo where you can the objects flying up and down suddenly, change direction, and bounce throughout the sky. 
3. at first i have thought the objects were stars, planes, or some kind city light. but after awhile (i know this sounds crazy) i have been able to spot the objects frequently. to the point were i have become paranoid. i feel like i have a mental disorder. it starts to consume and the sightings will happen so often that i am legitimately terrified and no longer think the quest to seek the truth is fun, but rather similar to a weegee (not sure of spelling) board. to explain, i feel as if the more open, inviting, and curious i have been, the more i have been shown. at times i have to ask the universe to stop because it is too much. the odd but really amazing thing is, it does. 
4. as i mentioned in question 2, my sightings have begun with an unusual light that beams brighter yellow kind of pulsating and hypnotizing way were i am entranced. then i get a rush of wanting to know what is it that i have been seeing. is it man made? so then i have followed the object making weird turns trying to get out of the city lights. once i have, i start to video the object(s), take pictures and film in slow-motion. the object(s) are hovering in the sky, not moving. at other times (not tonight) i have footage of the lights in the objects seeming to communicate. tonight's footage however i chased the object for about 30
minutes trying to get a clear view once i spotted it. i then gave up and was driving to my house because my friend had watched the bachelor without me because i was taking so long. i figured i would try and see the object from the top of my garage. when i got to the top level, it was there or moving towards a certain spot were it hovered for what felt like 10 minutes. it didn't move. just shined. the craziest thing is that after a few minutes, the object started moving towards me. i was kind of freaked out and excited at the same time. this is when t was bizarre. as it move towards me, it was like the captain hooks ship on peter pan. it got closer, and as it did, the objects lights changed. to me, it was if the tipped over and became flat like a pancake. the perpendicular lights were now horizontal and the red, yellow and white was emitted from a now circular shaped object. i could not believe it was happening but i did not feel scared. i felt excited. i tried to look up to see what the middle was like. when i did, i couldn't see anything. after emitting glowing lights around the circumference of a circular object, the object gained speed and it looked as if it somehow had wings - one on each side emitting 2 perpendicular flashing yellow lights (now not as bright but similar to a plane) on each side. as i am reflecting on it now, it is as if there was more than one level in the object.
5. after a previous sighting i had documented a little less than a month ago, i felt terrified and asked the universe to please stop. this was because i caught a couple of things while filming in slow mo that was super scary and i was confused about. this time i felt great, excited, comfortable but at the same time leaves with what does this mean and why does this keep happening and am i going to get obsessed again with finding the truth in what i have seen.
6. i lost sight of the object because i could no longer see over the top of my parking garage because i was at an angle. 

***have more footage of this account and another. please, if you find this unusual, contact me. i just want answers and to not feel crazy.
content.summary: Have witnessed multiple ufo sightings within the last 2 months. closest i have ever witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: Im an airline captain with 30 years flying experience. we were operating a flight from miami to nashville cruising at 36000 feet over lakeland florida. suddenly i and my first officer noticed about five very bright lights over the gulf of mexico between 50 and 100 miles to the west. they were very bright , uniform in distance, and were stationary. when one would extinguish on the right another would appear to the left. the entire event lasted less than one minute. we discussed the possibility of them being military flares but they maintained altitude and appeared to turn on and off as opposed to burning. it was definitely not another aircraft. i have seen many strange and amazing things during my career but nothing like this.
content.summary: Unkown lights over gulf of mexico

content.detailedDescription:
My father's "near death experience" many years ago could be connected to unusual and possibly paranormal activity around my parent's home.

many years ago, he had a "near death" reported "out-of-body" experience in the hospital.

the "entities" who "saved him" seemed to have put him on some kind of "mission".

these entities seemed to have continued to contact him through his dreams which he claimed to be in "multidimensional space".

during the last 12 months this apparent invasive contact by these entities with my father seemed to have become more frequent / demanding.

several years ago, long after my father's "near death experience" i had multiple dreams that seem to pivot on a red gate.  i had never seen this area before; but for some reason i knew that the place was another part of the same city that i had been residing.  i remember waking up from these dreams with a "bad feeling" and being relieved that "it was only a dream".  but since having these dreams i began to be weary that something 'bad' was about to happen in the future that kept me feeling somewhat preoccupied about the need to be weary and 'cautious'.

back to the much more recent past, a couple of years ago, my father began to daydream more as if his conscious mind was floating in some other dimension.  he would seemed to be "spaced out".  when he would come out of these "day dream states" he would either constantly talk about childhood memories in the past or his apparently more frequent contacts with beings in "multidimensional space" that gave him somehow a source of 'solace'.

he then became obsessed with writing about the notion that humans should become members of a "bio-electric union".

i told him that it did not sound as if this entities sought to support humanity's "best interests" and that "such a construct that he wrote about seemed to have no regard to empathy that is vital to our human bio-spiritual interconnectedness."

during this time, he began to switch into a "dual personality" involving violent / psychotic states. one minute he would be his normal quiet self, even sleeping, and then from time to time he would wake up with a wild eyed look like he was truly possessed.  

in this state of mind, he would make gratuitous verbal "out of the blue attacks" at mostly me in the beginning.. but would soon eventually be aimed at my mom who remarked that she was "too much out of tears to be able to cry anymore."

my mom shown symptoms of what doctors described as an unusual ataxia / aphasia condition literally overnight in which she began having difficulty to speak.

when i once commented to my father on his new apparent split-personality persona that began to neglect / abuse my mom, he got this wild stare look again as if he was "possessed". he then charged me as i stood beside the refrigerator from the kitchen table. he then took out a kitchen knife pointing it toward my stomach as if he was about to stab me there.

he ended up almost cutting-off my little finger when i grabbed the knife to stop him that required me going into emergency reconstructive surgery and rehabilitation for six months.  he has denied any recollection of the incident to-date.

i later began to look for another place to live that i eventually found, but elected to stay at my parent's home in spite of the anger and violence that was directed at me.

i then began having difficulty sleeping in much of my parent's home due to unusual apparent electromagnetic "humming" noises like some kind of wasps in your ears that was accompanied by an an attempted paralysis that i would constantly need to shake-off while trying to sleep.

my father then began to become angry at my care-giving for my mom who had been an rn and very empathetic. 

my calling the ambulance last summer when my mom was not breathing also made him angry.  he accused me of being an "alarmist". 

he soon began to apparently find it easy to lie when he had abhorred lying and had once spoken of the importance of 'integrity' to him.  his personality started to switch like 'dr. jekyll and mr hyde'.

he then got the police to evict me from care giving for my mom the end of april 2015 with the support of my sister just after 2 am.

luckily, i had already found a place but had not finished moving into it.  but, when i woke up tin the morning and began to drive out, i was shocked to see the very red gate that i had seen in my dream years ago.

i last saw my mom at a "neutral location" outside my parent's home on 12 june 2015 when she had lost the ability to talk, speak and write.

my father under the apparent increasing control of some kind of non-empathetic regressive entities for weeks refused to not only allow me to continue to take care of my own mother under the police threat of trespassing nut to my further shock block all efforts by the police appointed social service agency to help my mom.

then some unusual cop who i nicknamed "agent 666" became determined to prevent me from seeing my mom who i have sought to resume my care giving.  

he came to my residence out of uniform to threaten me to stop contacting relatives about activities associated with my father's and sister's blocking of me seeing my mom and began to threaten the agency that had sought to facilitate contact with my mom.

my sister who had aspirations of power, ignored any abuse that i had reported about my father against my mom, and had began this whole charade in early january 2015 that i had allegedly started a "domestic dispute" while i had been cooking for my mom at the time.  she seemed to have "hired" this cop who has sought to block my mom and i seeing each other.

i had been cooking for my mom, father and my sister who had been visiting from europe, and who had taken my parents out.  

when she arrived back with my parents rather than being relieved that she did not have to cook; she went into a bizarre state of anger which began to threaten me -- which resembled the bizarre state of anger that my father would spontaneously launch into from time to time against my mom and i.  that's when "my sister" decided to call the police to make-up the story that i started a "domestic dispute".

i also note that my mom's brother ignored the reports.  he has reportedly been a member of a "lodge" which may or may not be related.

it appears that my father's mind has been substantively assimilated by some kind of psychotic alien intelligence that is actively working with other alien operatives on earth.  this alien activity appears to include my sister and the "police detective" that she hired and a senior-ranking judicial administrator who appears to have reversed the desire of a judge that was about to approve an emergency motion for me to see my mom. 

it appears that regressive alien operatives have sought to participate in some kind of plan to keep my now sick and disabled elderly mom (who can't speak, write or walk thanks to apparent alien operatives) and i from seeing each other for an "unknown agenda". in general, these activities suggest that regressive aliens in targeted areas of civil society may be seeking to "pilot" human hosts through their minds to then experiment on humans toward some broader take-over / control agenda.

"organized efforts" to prevent my mom and i from seeing each other which appear to be affiliated to "my father's" 'near death experience' and subsequent contact by "entities" suggest a hierarchically-controlled command system that is substantively controlled by non-empathetic beings that conceal themselves in an apparent human form consistent with john carpenter's film "they live".
content.summary: Regressive alien manipulation through near death experience - alien control, abduction and interference

content.detailedDescription: It was about 2 a.M. and in the middle of winter and i wanted to smoke a cigarette but it was too cold outside so i used to smoke in my bathroom with the window open. i lived in the middle of a small suburban development but i had a clear view of the sky. after living here for almost 2 years it was not uncommon for me to see bright stars that seem to look like ufos or even actual ufos. so every time i would smoke out the window i would always keep my eyes toward the sky. this particular night i saw a bright ball in the distance. it looked like it was over a mile away. at first i thought it was a very bright star or even a planet but as i watched i could tell that it was moving slowly back and forth up and down. after about 10 minutes it began to change color and pulse. ranging from blue yellow and red is slowly got bigger.It wasn't actually getting bigger but moving closer. as it came closer i started to see a structure. it literally flew over my house and i was leaning out of the window to keep an eye on it. as it flew over i could see what look like a very strange and long stealth bomber type aircraft. the moon was very bright that night so i could tell how dark it was.There were lights at the front of the structure that were white. as it flew over i could see what look like a small room underneath the structure like the cockpit of a blimp. i could see what looked like windows but i could not see inside. i could not detect any type of landing gear but as it flew away i could see 8 red lights on the back of the structure. it looks like what you could imagine as stereotypical rocket boosters. as it flew byit sounded like a deep hum combined with a very low rumble but still very quiet. it did not cast a shadow. i tried my hardest to keep my eyes on it as it flew but i eventually lost it. i was completely in shock and didn't believe myself at first. the next day i recounted what i saw to my girlfriend at the time and the look on her face looks like she didn't believe me. she asked why i didn't try to take pictures. it didn't even occur to me to try because i was so amazed at what i saw. even if i had tried to take pictures on my phone i doubt they would have came out because i had a horrible phone at the time with a horrible camera.I have seen many strange things in the sky from that window but never anything like that before.
content.summary: Starlike ball in the distance changing color and direction. then flew closer and over my house and into the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
I received a psychic impression of 3 aliens with bald heads. i went to check the living room and i didn't see anything. next i heard the bedroom
door slam shut. in the morning i found weird imprints into the wood of my
deck leading across the deck to my patio door. i have been undergoing 
hypnotic regression for previous abductions with craig lang of the mufon
art team. a black light showed florescence on the carpeting by my bedroom
door. my roommate confirms hearing the bedroom door slam shut and the
weird path across the deck to the patio door.
content.summary: I woke up to hear strange noises in my living room.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv , and stepped outside to smoke at about 9:10 pm cst . i noticed a flickering light ascending at a very high rate of speed while facing off my front porch directly to the east, the object gained altitude incredibly quickly, and changed position from left to right randomly by  3-5 degrees while moving to the northwest. the object seemed to defy normal movement and gravity by appearing to the side, or above, or below, its previous position as at random. i called my wife to the porch, and said to my wife "connie get out here you gotta see this, am i crazy". about that time my wife came outside and together we watched three other objects proceed from the same approximate position and act erratically, ascending from the east to the northwest in a manner that was not rational given the laws of gravity.At this point my wife became very concerned, and we went inside and shut the door and blinds. i am a veteran that has been stationed at ft. bragg, and ft. sill, as well as afghanistan. i have seen all sorts of artillery fire, rocket fire, aircraft, drones, ect...  and have never seen anything like this in my life, nor has my wife. it was bizarre to say the least.
content.summary: Four acendending lights at irregular intervals changing position semingly random moving from east to northwest with no reggular pattern

content.detailedDescription: J'ai vus une forme ovale blanche on aurais dit une texture nuageuse qui collait vers le ciel assez rapidement direction nord-est très étrange parce que ça n'avais pas l'air d'un avion de quelque sorte et beaucoup trop haut et rapide pour un hélicoptère au camping st roch vers 2 heure je crois j'ai essayé de le prendre en photo mes je l'ai perdu de vu en allant chercher mon ipod sa a duré environ 2 minute et à disparu dans les nuage////i saw a white oval one would have said a cloudy texture that clung to the sky fairly quickly northeasterly direction very strange because it did not look like a plane of some kind and much too high and fast for a helicopter. to camping st roch. to 2 hours.  i tried to take a picture with my  ipod but i lost sight.That lasted about two minutes and disappeared into the cloud.
content.summary: Forme blanche très rapide et ovale

content.detailedDescription:
As my kids and i were driving home from my dads house i noticed a couple of strange lights in the sky and pointed them out to my daughter. not thinking to much of them, i kept driving. as i drove about another 1/2 mile i noticed about 5-6 more of these objects that appeared to change color between a bright white than fully turn red. i then turned right onto a smaller street that is next to a park and started filming. 

the objects made no noise from our vantage point and appeared to follow each other. also, they seemed to speed up substantially the higher they got. when they reached a certain height they seemed to fade out.
content.summary: Saw strange lights in the sky while driving home.

content.detailedDescription:
Date of sighting: 1/1/16
location of sighting:  thermopolis, wy
time of sighting:  12:30 a.M.
number of ufos seen:  one
weather:  clear cloudless sky, around zero degrees
reporter of sighting:  woman 59 years of age; employed in legal profession and work for the federal government.
equipment used for sighting:  binoculars
i was in a motel room on second floor.
i wanted to try out my new binoculars, so went outside on the balcony.
i immediately noticed flashing colored lights in one area.
i focused the binoculars on the lights. 
the ufo i saw was in the sky, and was a black triangle with different colored lights flashing on all 3 sides of the object.
the ufo was hovering and appeared to be not moving in any direction.
the colored lights on the 3 sides of the ufo were flashing.
i stayed on the balcony for half an hour, despite the zero degree temperature because the object fascinated me and i wanted to be certain it was not a plane or a planet.
the flashing lights outlined a black triangle so the shape of the ufo was definitely a triangle.
i zoomed my binoculars in on other objects i.E. stars, etc.
the stars had no colored lights and were not flashing; they were stationary white stars.
i finally concluded this was definitely a triangle shaped ufo with various colors of flashing lights on all 3 sides of the triangle, and that the object was hovering in the sky.
the next night on 1/2/16, i went outside on balcony at same time and the object was not in the night sky.
content.summary: One black triangle shaped ufo hovering with flashing different colored lights on all 3 sides of object.

content.detailedDescription: I watch some meteor showers, so i was watching for the taurid fire balls turned out lights in the house so it would dark, went to see if there was anything happening, stood there, waited for about five or ten minuets and seen my first fire ball. knowing this would be a good night i set myself up with adarondak chair with soft drink, blanket cusion, for lengthy stay. saw one or two small ones, about to lose interest, while facing north i could barely make out something coming straight at me about 30 degreas off horizon. it had no lights, made no noise, seem to be gliding. couldn't make out what it was, but looked to be about 20ft across with i thought to look like something hanging down underneath. not knowing what it was or what to expect, i started to get a better look at this thing but my mind and eyes wouldn't let me accept what i was seeing. it glided straight over my porch with roof, so i jumped up and ran to south end of porch. waiting for it to come on over there it was. it looked to be a 1 or 2 hundred feet above me. with a loud yelp hollered what is .? ! #that with other choice words. watched it glide out  of sight. i do some flying, cessna, and can judge pretty well how high something is and by judging with that if it were a plane i could have read the numbers on a plane. i could see it! it seem to adjust for gliding but had no known propulsion. stayed even keel, same elevation, same speed, same direction. first i said taradoctyle? but no visible head, letting my head accept what i seen. it seemed to be some sort of entity. and my searching the internet i came across mothman. with what i thought were light colored bags hanging down. now i'm thinking legs hanging down. with dark brown wings. but enough about what i think, there you go. that's my story and i'm sticking to it. lol!
content.summary: Glided in straight path

content.detailedDescription:
My best friend and i decided to smoke some black and milds by a neighborhood pool before heading home. we had hung out all day and decided it would be nice to sit outside and hangout because it was so beautiful outside. we sat down on two pool tanning chairs and were just talking to each other. we had sat down around 8:50 -9:00 pm. 

about 5-10 minutes had gone by and i was telling my buddy something. after i stopped talking in noticed he wasn't saying anything. when i looked over at him to see why he was staring in the sky. he almost looked hypnotized. when i saw him looking up i decided to see what he was staring at. 

when i looked at the sky i saw a boomerang shaped object with large gold symbols on the bottom of the ufo. it was hovering directly above us and wasn't making a sound. after around 5-10 seconds it flew off very fast. when it flew off i did not make a sound. i lost sight of it almost immediately when it left. 

when it was hovering it was totally still. the object was also very close to us. when comparing it to the two story clubhouse it was almost even with the roof on the second story. when i first saw it i didn't really know what to think. i just kind of starred at it unable to look away.
content.summary: A boomerang shaped ufo hovered above a friend and i then flew off

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I had gone to the park to photograph the sunset, so looking west, i noticed a light appear in the sky, far away from me. the closest that i can describe it was as if someone had struck a match. it was bigger when it first appeared it seem to appeared as it was fuel by some kind of combustion. it was hard to tell because of the far distance. i did think it might be an airplane turning in my direction, but i decided to photograph it just in case it was not an aircraft. i also took video of it. i witnessed it in the sky for about 10 minutes, and it seemed to remain stationary. to the naked eye it looked light a large star, but in the photographs and video it looks more like a piece of cloud, although strangely shaped at times. witnessing it without the camera, it just looked like a bright star. dark clouds were passing left to right and they passed in front of this light and that is when i lost sight of it. i didn't wait for the clouds to pass the light to see if it would still be visible because i was on foot and i didn't want to walk home by myself in the dark, so at that time i left. i will attach a photo.
content.summary: Stationary bright light - as it appeared in the sky it reminded me of a match being ignited. it was far away and at first i thought it might have been an airplane turning in my direction. witnessed for 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
1 local: rodovia br-101, km 132 - between balneário camboriú e itajaí,
- balneário camboriú - camboriú / sc  brazil - cep  88332-510
26°59'36.8"s 48°39'30.4"w

2-6 it was a cloudless night and very dark place, in the evening i showed my friends the conjunction between the moon and jupiter and the satellite iridium flare would pass very close to jupiter. after close to midnight i was looking at the southern cross when i saw the first object like a satellite on 5 magnitude but moving much faster and doubled its speed  across the sky and stopped abruptly between the constellation of leo and virgo, there in that region the sky had others like objects and began making movements as if it were looking for something, accelerated, hovered and performed moves in circles. the event lasted until 5 o'clock when i left the place.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looks like magnitude 5 satellites, but movements ranges from steady, rapid acceleration and circles

content.detailedDescription: Ufo activity in n.W.Wa& canadian border 01-08-16 around 20 or so ufos witnessed this night. i was outside at dusk time was around 5:30pm & looking over towards the canadian border i saw theses sphere/star shaped objects, one went flying east at a very fast rate, then another one caught my eye straight out in front of my view it looked like it was coming straight down to earth then stopped. i had dinner cooking on the stove so i had to run in & take care of that. i hurried as fast as possible then went back outside the 2 that i saw were gone. so then i searched around in the same areas & i saw another one flying east, this one was easier to see as it was getting darker outside. as a little time went on, i noticed that there were more star like things in the sky moving slow/hovering with small zigzag movement. there were a lot of them. soon after i was watching all this go on time was roughly 7pm & from the sounds of the thuds i counted 3 military helicopters, one helicopter flew low right over my house & it was so low flying just above my trees. this really freaked me out & i ran inside the house. i called my son & his girlfriend asking them if they would come right over asap. my son pointed out what also looked like a helicopter but it was silent. then after a little while we noticed two of these star like things blink lights at each other the one on the left was a little higher in altitude & the one to the right changed its color of flashing lights to a blue/white color moving towards the one on the left, it looked like it was warning the other one. as this was going on we saw one of the helicopters flying over head & went towards these things really fast. the ufo on the left took off so fast in a upwards n.W.Direction. the one on the right started flashing its blue/white lights brighter & faster, it also looked like some of the light shot out a little like lightning.Then it swooped downward a little then upward following the other ufo. in the n.W. direction. some of the other star like things would move a little bit but enough to notice that they were definitely there as the helicopters flew around circling in huge circles covering a large area of n. whatcom co. the helicopters hung around for a little while after they chased off the 2 ufos & then there wasn't much activity in the sky after the helicopters left & what i could see with my eyes was so high up in attitude it was difficult to see what was what. i did call 911 to report this & while i was on the phone i looked west towards lummi reservation/birchbay area & i saw one more of these things lower in altitude, it changed its light to blue/white color with the lightening thing & so quickly disappeared this was by far the most exciting sight i have ever seen in the skies. the next day i ran a post on a local site asking if anyone saw this & yes there were. one lady got pictures, i was so happy because i could figure out how to work my new phone. on sunday my son and i noticed a lot of chemtrails in the sky, i'm very curious if this has anything to do with this sighting on friday ?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting in n.W washington and canadian border area

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of flying geese and only afterwards noted strange shapes on picture. i was amazed. heard of people or sighting ufo never thought it would happen to me.  did nothing t see it in the air only on the picture.
content.summary: Picture on camera over lake

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard when i noticed what i thought was a bright star, it started moving toward me then changed altitude like it was coming down. i thought then, if it's an ultralight it better go up to avoid the power lines. it appeared to be circling around. then i thought it could be somebodies drone until it got closer and it appeared to be a "v" shape with one light on it. i lost sight of it for awhile and went outside and talked to my neighbor across the street, he did not see anything. the sun was starting to come up and he told me about a half hour later that he saw the light in the area i had told him about. he said that it was in the sky then shot straight up and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Thought it to be maybe a drone or ultralight but it changed direction up and down.

content.detailedDescription:
Bright clear day. craft flying same direction as we were driving 30 miles an hour 300 feet long elliptical windows entities in windows red light and green light cast steady beam that stopped large windows with beings standing inside. my brother and i observed it until our road veered away and it kept going straight. 
1. we were on our way to models store. driving on lark field road.
2. it was hugh at least 300 feet across and about 500 feet away
3. blimp but it was ufo ship unmistakable
4. straight flight no deviation no noise
5. excited to see it
6. our road curved away from it. lost sight
content.summary: Flying same direction as we were driving 30 miles an hour 300 feet long elliptical windows entities in windows

content.detailedDescription: I was in tampa florida heading towards anna meria island from the skywaybrige i decided to take some pictures for our memory back/facebook. and when i looked their it was just hovering over the water that's when i noticed it and took pictures of it, amazing sight it was like  standstill like it was just handing in the sky with no strings it was perfectly circle nice and metallic steal look to it. i have seen these orbs/lights before i'm no stranger to them. when i noticed the orb i was so excited felt like i had a  connection i felt so good inside love peace shocked. the feelings i had were just one of a kind. i lost sight of the object when my girl kepted driving.
content.summary: Driving on the skyway bridge looking at the ocean when i see a  sphere hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I would guess this incident happened in the early 1980's in clawson, michigan. i was probably 6 or 7 years old. this occurred in the middle of the night (assuming between midnight and 3 am).

although i never saw an object, i am curious as to other sightings that may have been reported at the time.

i was sleeping in my bedroom that i shared with one of my sisters. i woke up for an unknown reason. i looked across the room and saw my sister waking up as well. 

i realized that there was the most brilliant blue/white light coming through the bedroom window. each of our beds were on either side of the window. we both stood up on our beds to get a good view of outside. 

i remember asking my sister where the light was coming from. she said she did not know. as i looked out the window, i remember thinking that this was the brightest light i had ever seen. the entire neighborhood was lit up. it was almost like it was broad daylight, but it was the middle of the night. i was very confused, and never saw the source of the light.

i have no memory of laying back down in bed. the next thing i remember is waking up in my bed the next morning.

a little while later, our dad yelled at us from the back yard to come outside. my sister and i went to the middle of the back yard where our dad was. he was pointing to the ground and yelling at us. he asked us if we had been playing with matches. 

i was baffled at what i saw: a circular burn mark in the grass. a perfect circle approximately 10 inches across. the width of the circle was about 1-2 inches. (it kind of looked like a donut) the grass inside the circle was not burned at all. the burnt part looked like it was matted down in a typical swirling, crop circle way.

we denied playing with matches to our dad. then i mentioned the bright light that we had seen the night before. he did not believe us needless to say, we got in trouble for playing with matches.
content.summary: Blue/white light lit entire neighborhood, burn circle in back yard

content.detailedDescription: It was dark out so i went for a walk as a usually do. i saw a few airplanes pass over head like normal. i could tell what they were by the way their lights blinked. i like looking at the stars when i walk but one seemed to stand out to me. as i walked i noticed something was off about it. i couldn't put my finger on it but this one star had me confused. as i watched it it went from a solid red standing still to flashing different colors. i first thought well it's just a plane until the colors went from the usual red and blinking to a random pattern of blinks and colors ranging from blue to red to black and white. all while still in the same spot. i stopped and tried to record it on my ipod but it was too dark. then it started to move slowly. it moved so slow. i can't stress that enough. i've never seen anything move that slow. the lights would seem to flash in a pattern then the pattern would change to something else. as it crossed the treeline i started home to call my brother. then i looked into the sky again and saw two more objects. this time no lights, no sound, nothing. just two black planes flying the same direction fast. i went inside and called my brother baffled about what i had just saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,N/A
content.summary: Blinking lights random movement and patterns.
